revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #21 Grana |image = [[File:Pomeg.png]] |caption = Cuando se pela la piel gruesa de esta baya dulcemente picante, se derraman muchos pedazos de la fruta. |growtime = 1h 30m 0s |harvest = 20 bayas |replant = 20% |mutation = 0.05% |points = 500 |flavor =
*10 picante *0 seco *10 dulce *10 amargo *0 ácido }} '''Grana''' es un tipo de [[Berries|Baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela vacía con al menos 1 [[Pabaya]] y al menos 1 [[Ango]]. == Tablas de crecimiento == === Tablas de crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 mins 20 secs || 20 mins || 1 hora 6 mins 40 secs || 1 hora 30 mins - 3 horas |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PomegTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PomegTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PomegTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === iempos de maduración con modificadores === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! Ninguno | 1 hora 30 mins -
3 hora || --- |- ! Abono/Psydugadera | 1 hora -
2 hora || 9 abono |- ! Abono y Psydugadera | 40 mins -
1 hour 20 mins || 6 abono |} == Diagrama de Flujo == [[File:Pomeg_Flow_Chart.png|250px]]
== Estrategia de Mutación == === Posibles formaciones === Puedes llenar tu granja de la siguiente manera para obtener bayas Pomeg. Los cuadrados morados indican dónde pueden ocurrir mutaciones.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="height: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Iapapa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Mago]] || 6 mins 10 secs until ripe || 4 mins 7 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Pomeg berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Tamato.png|20px]] [[Tamato]] || [[File:Razz.png|20px]] [[Razz]] |- |}
